description: Update a project transport plan event
permissions: User must be authorized for the related project transport plan (delegated via the project transport plan; access is based on project access or being an active driver on the plan).
side_effects: Updates a project transport plan event; may create a project transport location event type for the location/event type pair; may enqueue a location prediction autopsy when the location changes.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (project transport plan event ID). At least one updatable field must be provided. --project-transport-event-type cannot be empty. --project-transport-location, --project-material-type, and --project-transport-plan-stop accept empty values to clear. Project transport plan cannot be changed after creation. project_transport_location must belong to the same broker as the plan. project_material_type must belong to the same project as the plan. If project_transport_plan_stop is set with project_transport_location, the location must match the stop location. If a plan stop is linked and the event type is updated, the event type role must match linked transport order stop roles.

flags.name: --external-tms-event-id
flags.validation: Can be set to an empty string to clear.

flags.name: --project-transport-location
flags.validation: Can be set to an empty string to clear.

flags.name: --project-material-type
flags.validation: Can be set to an empty string to clear.

flags.name: --project-transport-plan-stop
flags.validation: Can be set to an empty string to clear.
